from bisect import bisect_left, bisect_right
T = int(input())
for t in range(T):
    (n, p) = map(int, input().split())
    data = map(int, input().split())
    temp = [0]
    for v in data:
        temp.append((temp[-1] + v) % p)
    record = 0
    count = 0
    arr = []
    for v in temp:
        i = bisect_right(arr, v)
        if i < len(arr):
            u = arr[i]
            vv = (v - u) % p
        else:
            u = 0
            vv = v
        delta = bisect_right(arr, u) - bisect_left(arr, u)
        if record < vv:
            record = vv
            count = delta
        elif record == vv:
            count += delta
        arr.insert(i, v)
    print(record, count)

from bisect import bisect_left, bisect_right
T = int(input())
for t in range(T):
    (n, p) = map(int, input().split())
    data = map(int, input().split())
    temp = [0]
    for v in data:
        temp.append((temp[-1] + v) % p)
    record = 0
    count = 0
    arr = []
    for v in temp:
        i = bisect_right(arr, v)
        if i < len(arr):
            u = arr[i]
            vv = (v - u) % p
        else:
            u = 0
            vv = v
        delta = bisect_right(arr, u) - bisect_left(arr, u)
        if record < vv:
            record = vv
            count = delta
        elif record == vv:
            count += delta
        arr.insert(i, v)
    print(record, count)
